item.title: Lisa add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Denis Waitley
item.description: "Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude." -- Denis Waitley

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Candace Bushnell
item.description: "You have to let go of who you were to become who you will be." -- Candace Bushnell

item.title: Lisa add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought; and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dana Buchman
item.description: "Look at yourself, like yourself, and find the positive." -- Dana Buchman

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Henry Van Dyke
item.description: "Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love and to work and to play and to look up at the stars." -- Henry Van Dyke

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep." -- Scott Adams

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Personally, I'm always ready to learn, although I do not always like being taught." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, nor to worry about the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly." -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Siddhārtha Gautama
item.description: "You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection" -- Siddhārtha Gautama

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Gautama Buddha
item.description: "All that we are is the result of what we have thought: it is founded on our thoughts and made up of our thoughts. If a man speak or act with an evil thought, suffering follows him as the wheel follows the hoof of the beast that draws the wagon.... If a man speak or act with a good thought, happiness follows him like a shadow that never leaves him." -- Gautama Buddha
